programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice
programme.desc: Covering a fifth of the earth's surface, the Arctic tundra is one of the coldest places on the planet. The piercing temperatures and powerful winds challenge even the hardiest of creatures.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Iceland: Land of Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Iceland is a land born out of fire, sculpted by ice. This unique island is home to some of the planet's rarest and most spectacular creatures and it harbors some of the most extreme environments on Earth.

programme.title: Wildest India: India's Lost World
programme.desc: North-east India is an anthropological paradise; there is no other place on Earth with so many different ethnic groups. The forest are filled with mysterious tribes whose lives are dictated by the rain and the seasonal fruits of the forest.

programme.title: Wildest India: Ganges: River of Life
programme.desc: Then watch, the longest river in India, The Ganges. It's a lifeline to wild animals, from rhinoceros and river dolphins to otters and gharials.

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits
programme.desc: The Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India. he Himalayas' rugged highlands offer little direct refuge to humans, in the shadow below, over a billion people in India rely on the mountains for survival.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, a high-priced and ruthless jury "consultant" will stop at nothing to secure a verdict on an explosive trial.

programme.title: The Man Without A Face
programme.desc: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then, he finds out the disfigured recluse (Mel Gibson, "Braveheart") living nearby is an ex-teacher.

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.

programme.title: The Human Duplicators
programme.desc: An alien takes over a professor's mansion-basement laboratory, and makes android clones to infiltrate the government.

programme.title: The Killer Shrews
programme.desc: An experiment on a remote island goes awfully awry when Professor Marlowe Cragis and his research team accidentally create giant, venomous shrews.

programme.title: The Beast of Yucca Flats
programme.desc: After a devastating atomic test, Joseph Javorsky, a defecting Russian scientist, is transformed into a murderous radioactive beast.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: It's a Headless Horse, Man / Voyage to the Bottom of the Deep
programme.desc: McGee is thrilled when he wins a mounted horse head.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Slugfight / Izomborg
programme.desc: The campers must travel back in time to prevent Grandpappy Black Butt from stealing the deed.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Eclipsalypso / Apocalypse Squirt
programme.desc: McGee summons the Moon Dervish who will bring the Apocalypse unless a sasquatch dances for him.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Camp Lockdownbottom / All You Need is Larva
programme.desc: Rosebud is sick of everyone borrowing her stuff, and draws the line when her precious golden ladle goes missing. After eating raw cookie dough, Squirt develops a case of worms!

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Schwampbillies / Remember Fort Sunny Bottom
programme.desc: When McGee, Gretchen and Squirt find themselves lost deep in the schwamp.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Fright Club / Bottomdome
programme.desc: The campers discover an enchanted flashlight.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Red Drawn / Pandora's Jock
programme.desc: A travelling salesman visits Lakebottom one boring rainy day and sells McGee a magic pencil.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Lakebo-tron / Rise of the Dawn of the Beginning of the Planet of Armand!
programme.desc: McGee and Buttsquat go head-to-head in an 80's style arcade game! But as the points build up, the boys become digitized inside the game. The kids head back through the Lakebottom inter-dimensional portal, hoping to find a Sasquatch version of the camp.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Bloody Marty / Ghost In The Mower
programme.desc: The kids ignore Rosebuds warning and summon Bloody Marty from the ominous mirror world.

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom: Head Two Head / The Last of the Wild

programme.desc: Solving crimes may begin with gut intuition, but advanced science provides investigators with irrefutable proof. When criminals go to great lengths to mask their crimes, Investigators must step up the challenge and remain forever undaunted.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stolen Identity

programme.title: The New Detectives: Witness To Terror

programme.title: The New Detectives: Drawing Conclusions

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Three Michelin-starred chefs judge a lobster dish cooked by the contestants as the challenge, with a prize of having caviar at a top restaurant at stake.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Andromeda: The Others
programme.desc: The Andromeda gets caught in a war between two ships -- and it includes a fatal disease.

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear Burns Down to Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is tricked by Rev and kidnapped. The crew finds an unexpected ally in a Collector.

programme.title: Andromeda: Lost in a Space That Isn't There
programme.desc: The Abyss has infected Beka. The crew must find a way to save her.

programme.title: Andromeda: Abridging the Devil's Divide

programme.title: Andromeda: Trusting the Gordian Maze
programme.desc: A spy from Tri Gemma shows up on the Andromeda in an attempt to steal the star map.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Symmetry of Imperfection
programme.desc: When Rommie becomes too emotional, the ship cuts her access in order to run diagnostics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of murdered Christchurch scrap-metal dealer, John Reynolds, to discover his killer and reveal the truth surrounding the violent attack.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In 1999, Kiwi engineer Aaron Hopa and his English colleague Robert Glazzard were murdered on board a survey ship in the Persian Gulf in.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Greenough Family Massacre
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Greenough, near Geraldton in Western Australia, some 400 kilometres north of Perth, will forever be associated with one the most horrific murders in Australian criminal history.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Evil Heart: The Murder of Donna Wheeler
programme.desc: The bloodied, semi-naked body of 30-year-old Donna Wheeler is discovered by her estranged husband Keith Bond and 12-year-old son.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Thrill Kill: The Janine Balding Murder
programme.desc: On a September night in 1986, two police officers climbed through a barbed-wire fence beside the F4 freeway at Minchinbury in Sydney’s west.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Mystery of the Homestead Murders
programme.desc: The quick mind of a country telephone exchange supervisor led to a horrific discovery at a NSW country homestead in 1978.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Hounded
programme.desc: Frank Da Costa, the new cop in town, has it in for Terry. When Terry unwittingly sells a pair of stolen Alpacas to Tess, he sets up an explosive confrontation that will unearth the dark secret at the heart of Frank's animosity.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Steer Trek
programme.desc: With the drought continuing, and no money to buy feed or truck in water, Claire, Tess, and Nick join forces. Like the Drovers of old, they take their amalgamated herds out on the Gungellan track.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Brave J
programme.desc: Tess motivates Claire into rekindling her dreams of becoming a stock horse trainer and breeder. There's no reason why the dream can't be pursued.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: You Can Leave Your Heart On
programme.desc: When Jodi's cooking gives five young men food poisoning, the women of Drovers must convince the Killarney men to put on a strip show.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Stripped Bare
programme.desc: When Drovers Run and then Wilgul are emptied by thieves, the Drovers Run women use Killarney as bait to trap the thieves and get their belongings back.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Bloodiest 47 Acres
programme.desc: TAPS is called out to Jefferson City, Missouri, to investigate the notorious Missouri State Penitentiary. A prison that was once named one of the most violent prisons in America.Riots, stabbings and executions left thousands dead over the years.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Camp Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Jason and TAPS go to camp! They head to Camp Rutledge in Georgia where a woman has experienced paranormal activity since she was a teenager.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 10
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: America's First Zoo

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison SAR works into the night to locate and extricate a paraglider hanging 30 metres up a tree in the forest.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams say goodbye to fallen SAR member Sheilah Sweatman.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Bears converge on an injured tree faller alone in the wilderness as Nelson SAR races to the scene.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison uses high tech sonar to help RCMP search for a missing camper.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A snowmobiler trapped 30 metres down an icy crevasse says goodbye to his wife and family.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR team up with a local psychic to find a missing person.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland SAR employs high tech and local knowledge to search for missing skiers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR is on a mountain mission for missing friends who failed to show up for a landmark birthday party.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Several SAR teams are called out after 200 snowmobilers arereported buried on Boulder Mountain near Revelstoke BC.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesn’t approve of her friends, doesn’t trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he can’t trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Test Taker Episode
programme.desc: Kevin gets roped into taking a test for a peer, spinning into motion various complications.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Compatibility Test Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne reaches out to a relationship expert, then comes to believe that she and Nick have compatibility issues.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Good Cop, Bad Cop Episode
programme.desc: When Suzanne gets tired of playing the role of bad cop to Nick's good cop, she makes it Nick's job to say \\"No\\" to the kids for an entire week.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The First .45 Episode
programme.desc: As Lindsey films a reality show about her family, Kevin comes across a gun in Suzanne's handbag---leading to drama and potential danger. Ice Cube and Chubb Rock guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Take Your Kids to Work Day Episode
programme.desc: When Lindsey accompanies Suzanne to work and meets an old friend of her mother's, a misunderstanding causes Lindsey to believe she may have an older brother.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Pole Dance Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Disney Episode
programme.desc: The family departs for a trip to Walt Disney World, but a cell-phone snafu and a scheduling conflict jeopardize the vacation.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Salsa Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne enlists in a salsa-dancing class with Nick, but her controlling nature soon becomes an issue.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Nick Gets Jealous Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Test Taker Episode
programme.desc: Kevin gets roped into taking a test for a peer, spinning into motion various complications.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction

programme.title: Paranormal State: Beer, Wine and Spirits

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Leeds Town Hall

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Ruthin Castle

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Revisit: Hastings
programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil revisit two couples in Hastings, Jakki and Scott, and newlyweds Nicola and Chris, only to find that one couple is now in a very different place.

programme.title: Dynasty: Enter Alexis

programme.title: Dynasty: The Verdict

programme.title: Dynasty: Alexis' Secret

programme.title: Dynasty: Fallon's Father

programme.title: Dynasty: Reconciliation
programme.desc: Steven returns to the mansion to recover from injuries sustained by his fall; Krystle's niece, Sammy Jo, arrives to spend a few weeks with the Carrigtons; Alexis hires a private investigator to delve into Krystle's past.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.233
programme.desc: A man faces a lawsuit for unpaid rent and property damage stemming from a Jacuzzi party, marijuana arrests, and roommate issues. Another man accuses his cousin of violence and property damage after refusing her late-night alcohol run request.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.238

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.133

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.253
programme.desc: A man is suing his ex-girlfriend’s son for allegedly stealing his dog and for purposely ramming his car with his bicycle. A loan to pay life insurance, the return of property, and alleged harassment are disputed by ex-lovers.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.231
programme.desc: A brutal St. Patrick’s Day brawl between ex-lovers sparks a lawsuit. A woman initially denies identity theft accusations but prefers not to involve police in finding the 'real' culprit later.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Glaciers
programme.desc: Clinging to the world’s highest mountains and forming ice caps on both poles, glaciers leave an impression on the landscape and on all who bear witness to their splendor.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the world’s greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Snow Mystery/Team Trouble
programme.desc: D.W. saves everything. But her most prized possession is a snowball from last winter. But now it’s disappeared! Then, Arthur, Francine, and Buster must do a report on ancient Rome--but can they work as a team to complete the assignment?

programme.title: Arthur: April 9th
programme.desc: April 9th is a normal day until a fire destroys the teacher's lounge and forces Lakewood Elementary to close. This unexpected event finds creates a wide range of emotional reactions, for Arthur, his friends and teachers, and the community.

programme.title: Arthur: Portrait of the Artist as a Young Tibble/The Secret Guardians
programme.desc: The Tibble Twins start a new business to earn enough money to buy the coveted Krummy Kreepy Kastle. When and friends stumble upon a beautiful woodland oasis right by their homes, they vow to tell no one and keep it as their secret spot.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Writes A Story/Arthur's Lost Dog
programme.desc: Struggling with a school assignment, Arthur decides that his regular life is just too boring to write about. And, Arthur is the only one who believes in the superior intelligence of his dog. But even Arthur gets confused when Pal runs away.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Barnes, Wingman/To Beat Or Not To Beat
programme.desc: Does Binky have a favorite pastime? Not until citywide Bug Week, when suddenly all he can think about is butterflies. Then, there's a horrible racket in Elwood City, and it's Francine practicing her singing and drumming for the Talent Show!

programme.title: Arthur: No Acting Please/Prunella Deegan and the Disappointing Ending
programme.desc: When Fern lands a role in a community production, she fears she's not talented enough to be a star. Finally, the final volume of the Henry Screever series is out. Prunella and Marina compete to see who can finish the book the fastest.

programme.title: Arthur: Mr. Ratburn's Secret Identity/Besties
programme.desc: Mysterious calls. Superhuman strength. Is Mr. Ratburn secretly a superhero? When Buster and Ladonna bond over a memorable trip to the movies, Arthur feels left out. Has Ladonna taken his place as Buster's best bud?

programme.title: Arthur: Get Smart/Baby Steps
programme.desc: Everyone loves HUGO--the new interactive whiteboard that claims to be 100% accurate. If only Mr. Ratburn knew how to use it. Mei Lin can say "hello" AND play the piano?!? Kate can't even wave!

programme.title: Arthur: George Scraps His Sculpture/Arthur's Big Meltdown
programme.desc: George creates a piece of art for the county-wide art show with the help of guest artist Kevin Sampson. Then, Arthur must learn how to control his temper after getting angry over a pair of sneakers!

programme.title: NEW: The Siege of Malta
programme.desc: At last here is the definitive story of heroism and hardship of a people uniquely and collectively awarded the George Cross 'for gallantry', and told by some of the heroic survivors.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: The battles of the first world war were battles of attrition and trenches; the battles of the second world war were vastly different. In this episode we study tank battles, blitzkrieg, commando raids, amphibious landings, and mobile warfare in the desert.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: The second world war was conflict on an unprecedented scale. Its battles set new marks for the sheer size of forces deployed and for the power of their weapons. In this episode we study the first battle at sea, and the largest army to have ever marched.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: A war that reached every continent and touched every sort of terrain demanded every sort of strategy. In this episode we examine battles fought at sea, and in the jungle, in city streets, invasions from the air, and retreats from the land.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: Battles are almost always about territory. Advancing the front line, seizing the port, the city, the oil field. The fate of nations in the war rose and fell on battles that took territory. Singapore, Monte Casino, Stalingrad...all about territory.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Since Leuh saw surfer Justin it's been insta-love. But after two failed attempts to meet up, she wants to know if he's the man of her dreams or is she one in a long line of online lovers. (S5, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kim & Matt
programme.desc: Kim's been pouring her heart out to Matt for over 10 years. Now, Kim's facing a life-changing decision - should she marry her current boyfriend or find out if Matt is her soul mate?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After months of sexting with a hot model he met on a hookup app, Marvin is eager to meet him in person. Max and sidekick, singer Chantal Claret, agree to help Marvin find his crush. (S6, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Keyonnah & Bow Wow
programme.desc: Superfan Keyonnah can hardly believe her luck, she's almost certain that she's been having an online relationship with her childhood crush, the rapper Bow Wow. Is this too good to be true?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Courtney & Isaak
programme.desc: Courtney broke up with Isaak, who she met online. He's doing everything to get her back. Beauty queen Cassidy Wolf joins Nev to get Isaak to leave Courtney alone for good. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rico & Ja'Mari
programme.desc: Rico wants to move to England to care for his ailing mother, but his intense online relationship with Ja'mari, an international male model, is giving him second thoughts about leaving.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Luke & Amy
programme.desc: Drummer Luke first started talking to nurse Amy when she came to one of his gigs 6 months ago. They had an instant spark but unfortunately every time they try and meet she cancels. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: The City: Fashion With A Capital F
programme.desc: Olivia refuses to wear a designer's clothes to their own party, which angers some. Whitney shows Joe Zee her line &amp; gets some harsh criticism. Erin eyes a replacement for Olivia. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: The Hills: You Have Chosen / With Friends Like These...
programme.desc: Heidi and Lauren get into a major argument about Spencer as Lauren feels like she is losing Heidi as a friend. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: The Hills: Enough Is Enough / New Year, New Friends
programme.desc: Spencer asks Heidi to move in with him but Heidi doesn't know what to do or how to tell her roommate, Lauren. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: The Hills: Apology Not Accepted / Everyone Falls
programme.desc: Lauren's turning 21 and Heidi has big plans for the birthday bash. But, before the party, Heidi decides it's time to tell Lauren about Spencer's big idea to move in together. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: The City: The British Are Coming
programme.desc: Olivia's flubs during Fashion Week leave an opening that Erin quickly tries to fill with a new fashion reporter. Roxy impresses Kelly by helping to produce a huge fashion show. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: The City: Work Horses And Show Ponies
programme.desc: Whitney and Roxy fly to Miami to put on a fashion show for Whitney's clothing line, without Kelly's help! Olivia fights for her job by scoring an interview with Zac Posen. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: The City: One Girl's Trash...
programme.desc: After a successful showing of her line, Whitney's first big sale almost ends in disaster. Erin thinks Olivia is taking undue credit for pulling the perfect look for an ELLE shoot. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: The City: Stage Fight
programme.desc: Roxy &amp; Whitney have a falling out when Roxy dresses a new musician in Whitney's clothing. Erin gains a spot on the Martha Stewart Show &amp; needs Olivia's help to make it a success. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Roommate Wanted
programme.desc: Roxy &amp; Whitney continue to fight &amp; Roxy looks for her own place. Olivia reluctantly interviews a celebrity wearing Whitney's line &amp; Erin sees another opportunity to replace her. (S2, ep11)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Where's Our Baby?
programme.desc: In November 1997, Marlene and Steve Aisenberg reported their five-month-old daughter Sabrina missing from her crib. Police soon focused on the parents as authorities became convinced that they knew more about the baby’s disappearance than they admitted.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Last Chance for Justice
programme.desc: A report on the 1980 murder of Marilyn McIntyre, who was found dead in her home. Her husband, Lane, had returned home from work that morning and found her body. As police checked into his alibi, he named his friend Curt Forbes as a potential suspect.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Amanda Knox: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The story of Amanda Knox, an American exchange student who was convicted, along with her Italian boyfriend, Raffaelle Sollecito, of murdering Amanda’s British roommate, Meredith Kercher in 2007.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder at Sea?
programme.desc: The disappearance of newlywed George Smith, who vanished from a cruise in the Mediterranean. This report uncovers the questionable alibis, failed polygraphs and a provocative video that involves the three men who last saw Smith alive.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Prophecy
programme.desc: Faylene Eaves, divorced Arizona mother of two, married Doug Grant, a divorced single dad, in 1993. They were both Mormons. Faylene had revelations from God that could have contributed to her death, however her husband was found guilty of murdering her.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family Torn Apart
programme.desc: The murdered body of Bob Dorotik, a engineer and father of three, was found by a mountain road near his home in the foothills of San Diego, Ca. Despite her denial of any involvement, Jane, Dorotik’s wife of 30 years, was arrested for the crime.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Ichabod Cricket shows up to be Garfield’s conscience, and everything backfires.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Forget Me Not/U.S Acres: I Like Having You Around!/Sales Resistance
programme.desc: Garfield loses his memory and becomes "nice."/Bo moves out of the house just as big storm hits./The worlds' greatest salesman shows up.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield discovers Jon’s new ventriloquist dummy is alive. Jon decides to take up skydiving.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Wardens: Trespassing for Deer

programme.title: Wardens: Bears and Water

programme.title: Wardens: Deer and Hockey

programme.title: Wardens: Honoring Tuskegee Airmen

programme.desc: On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: The Savage Murder of a Mother and her Daughter (Amato Case)
programme.desc: On March 31, 2003, firefighters were called to a fire in a housing estate of Meyrargues, near Aix-en-Provence. On site, they discovered a horrific scene: the tortured and charred bodies of a mother and her daughter, Chantal and Audrey D'Amato.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: The Key to the Enigma (Farid Ouzzane Case)
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man. In order to identify this unknown man, whose face was unrecognizable.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Ordeal of Schoolgirl (Perrais case)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Sabatini has decided to move from Bobsville to set up the Sunflower Valley bakery. Bob and the team are going to build him a new house close to the river. Muck asks if Spud can tag along as he’s been telling him exciting stories.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang leave to convert a house into two separate flats. Mr Bentley, meanwhile, has been left in charge of The Mayor’s dog.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is repairing a leaking water tank at the school, when he discovers bats in the belfry. He tapes up the tank temporarily, but says the bats will need a new home as they are a protected species.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has promised to put a cat flap in his kitchen door for Pilchard, but he gets an urgent call from Farmer Pickles who needs a fence built to keep the rabbits out of his lettuce field.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Farmer Pickles has a new family of Pigs being delivered to his farm and Bob must build a new home for them. In the meantime, Farmer Pickles places the pigs in an old Barn to keep them safe.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s the team’s first full day in Sunflower Valley and the machines are all a bit nervous of the mammoth job ahead. All except for Muck who is determined to show that he’s not a bit worried. Travis arrives with Bob’s new mobile home.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The whole town is practicing for an egg and spoon race, which Mrs Percival has organised. Trix decides to enter, but unfortunately she practices with fresh eggs and in her usual haste she manages to make a great mess in JJ’s yard.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has a day off and he takes a trip to Farmer Pickles farm to take some photographs for the town photography competition. Wendy, meanwhile, has been called to the school hall where a pipe has burst, threatening the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is installing an antique fireplace for Mrs Percival. He goes to JJ’s yard to collect it and finds JJ playing with his new model aeroplane. Bob then heads to Mrs Percival’s and starts to knock out the old fireplace.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr. Beasley decides to grow pineapples, and the best way top do this is to build a pineapple pit – a special pit, heated by horse manure! Travis wants to help and decides to fetch some horse manure from Farmer Pickles farm in Bobsville as quick as he can.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and crew are demolishing an old barn for Farmer Pickles, but as Lofty tests his demolition ball he accidentally damages one of the pillars at the entrance to Bob’s yard. Wendy offers to stay and repair this while Bob gets on with the day’s job.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a water feature in Mrs Potts’ garden, while Wendy and Scoop are demolishing a dry stone wall. Bob and the Machines are greatly amused by the statue Mrs Potts has chosen for her centrepiece.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scrambler is desperate to help Bob build a drying barn for Farmer Pickles sunflower farm. Scruffty is also excited about the building job and runs and jumps about getting in everyone’s way.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s just finished tidying his mobile home when Farmer Pickles comes and asks if he’ll help with his Sunflower Harvest. He needs a silo built in which to store the ripe sunflowers before they’re taken to the factory.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is installing a new pizza oven for Mr Sabatini, while Wendy lays a cycle lane in town. Mr Bentley has brought some Stop/Go signs to hold up the traffic while she works, but there is no-one to operate these with him – except Spud!

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team encounters some people trying to break into a Genomex lab and discover that they're ferals.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: One Taelon Avenue
programme.desc: Joshua Doors is running his own technology development company and Renee goes undercover to find out what is going on. An artificial intelligence program of the Taelons that controls human minds seems to be acting on its own.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Abduction
programme.desc: A volunteer who was working to interpret an ancient message from Ma'el assaults Da'an and escapes through a portal. Sandoval helps Da'an avoid interrogation from Zo'or while they try to locate her.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Arrival
programme.desc: A Taelon shuttle is shot down over Antarctica. There are Jiridians aboard, but two of the passengers escape. When Augur discovers Lili's blood on the ship, he is convinced that she is not dead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First Breath
programme.desc: A college friend of Renee's resurfaces and leads them on an investigation of the link between the Taelons and a biomedical facility's cloning operation.

programme.title: The Lost World: Mark of the Beast
programme.desc: Marguerite and Roxton discover a strange amulet that leaves the mark of a dinosaur on their skin. Those with the imprint begin to tap into their more primitive instincts.

programme.title: The Lost World: Survivors
programme.desc: The explorers discover an ancient Temple, where they face off against mystical and experience hallucinations. One of these visions gives them a map that leads Challenger to William Maple White.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Pirate's Curse
programme.desc: A seismic event opens the earth and send Marguerite and Roxton into a pit, where they discover a pirate's buried treasure...and his bones. A curse on the booty complicates matters.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Visitor
programme.desc: After Malone is attacked by a beast, he and Veronica meet her old friend Danu, who has also been injured. Danu goes missing, and the group travels to his village learning he is a werewolf.

programme.title: The Lost World: A Man of Vision
programme.desc: The five adventurers all experience visions of Summerlee, the companion they had presumed dead after he disappeared into a waterfall. They suffer injury and face danger as they pursue the vision.

programme.title: Luke Humphries At The Live Lounge

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla
programme.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in L.A.
programme.desc: Focuses on two California couples: the Adairs and the Shapiros. Mindy Shapiro discovered that her husband Michael, an orthopedic surgeon, was having an affair with Jeanie Adair, and in 1996, after 11 years of marriage, the couple opted for divorce.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Power and Passion
programme.desc: 48 Hours probes case of Alabama politician Stephen Nodine -- accused in the 2010 shooting death of his mistress, Angel Downs.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death at Cottonwood Creek
programme.desc: Frederick Mueller says while he and his wife were out for a walk near their vacation home, she fell off a cliff while he stopped to take a photo of her. Was it murder or an accident?

programme.title: 48 Hours: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: In September 1999, Brian Eftenoff of Phoenix, Az. Was convicted of murdering his wife, Judi. It was alleged that Eftenoff forced more than a gram of cocaine down his wife’s throat causing her to die of a cocaine-induced stroke.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Texas Confidential
programme.desc: A report on the 1997 murder of Doris Angleton, the wife of a successful Houston, Texas bookie. Doris’ husband Bob who claimed that his brother Roger was Doris’ killer, was tried for the crime in state court and acquitted. But the case did not end there.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fight For The Truth
programme.desc: 17-year-old Marty Tankleff was convicted of murdering his adoptive parents in their home. Marty initially confessed, but quickly recanted. He has fought for years for his innocence, as new witnesses have surfaced who could potentially exonerate him.
